SELECT count(*) FROM tbmall_member m LEFT JOIN tbmall_admin a ON m.member_no = a.member_no WHERE m.member_delete = 0 OR m.member_delete IS NULL
SELECT * FROM tbmall_member INNER JOIN tbmall_admin on tbmall_member.member_no = tbmall_admin.member_no
mapper.update: UPDATE tbmall_member SET member_delete = 1, member_delete_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE member_no = #{member_no}
UPDATE tbmall_member SET member_delete = 0, member_delete_at = NULL WHERE member_no = #{member_no}
mapper.select: SELECT m.member_no, m.member_id, m.member_nick, m.member_phone, m.member_email, m.member_delete, m.member_delete_at, a.admin_no, a.delete_right_no FROM tbmall_member m LEFT JOIN tbmall_admin a ON m.member_no = a.member_no WHERE m.member_delete = 1
